summary: This bill, H.R. 5058, proposes to designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 46164 Westlake Drive in Sterling, Virginia, as the “Firefighter Trevor Brown Post Office Building.” The bill outlines how this designation will be referenced in law and other official documents, ensuring consistent use of the new name. The bill was introduced to the House of Representatives on August 26, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform. It is a simple bill focused on honoring and commemorating an individual through a building name.
